title: When Melania Trump said she doesn't need to stand by Donald like Jill
content: ​Melania, according to Trump biographer Michael Wolff, never wanted to Donald Trump to run and she became the most demi-detached First Lady in US history. In 2016 when Trump moved into the White House, Melania initially stayed behind in their New York Trump Tower apartments, before finally heading to Washington in the summer of 2017. At that time, her excuse was Barron was in school and needed her to stay nearby.
summary: ​Melania, according to Trump biographer Michael Wolff, never wanted to Donald Trump to run and she became the most demi-detached First Lady in US history. In 2016 when Trump moved into the White House, Melania initially stayed behind in their New York Trump Tower apartments, before finally heading to Washington in the summer of 2017. At that time, her excuse was Barron was in school and needed her to stay nearby.

title: Meghan McCain asked to shut up on X as her Biden-bashing continues: 'Your father...'
content: Meghan McCain, daughter of former senator late John McCain was asked to shut up on X Saturday as she continued her tirade against Joe Biden and the Biden family. Social media users shared the old photo of Joe Biden comforting Meghan when her father was suffering from brain cancer. "Did Meghan say her father was cognitively incapable? No, she didn't," a user wrote.
summary: Meghan McCain, daughter of former senator late John McCain was asked to shut up on X Saturday as she continued her tirade against Joe Biden and the Biden family. Social media users shared the old photo of Joe Biden comforting Meghan when her father was suffering from brain cancer. "Did Meghan say her father was cognitively incapable? No, she didn't," a user wrote.

title: 'Smitten black girl rejected by Biden': What's the truth behind viral video?
content: ​A video of President Joe Biden ignoring a black woman supporter while merrily moving towards an old white supporter has gone viral with the Republican supporters sharing it and asking Donald Trump to make it his campaign video.
summary: ​A video of President Joe Biden ignoring a black woman supporter while merrily moving towards an old white supporter has gone viral with the Republican supporters sharing it and asking Donald Trump to make it his campaign video.

title: 'Neither fair nor free': US reacts to Iran's presidential poll outcomes
content: The United States has criticized Iran's recent presidential election, describing it as "neither free nor fair" and asserting that electing Masoud Pezeshkian as President will not alter the "Islamic Republic's stance on human rights". Pezeshkian, a reformist candidate, won the runoff election with approximately 53.6% of the vote, defeating ultraconservative Saeed Jalili. A US spokesperson emphasized that despite the election results, the United States intends to continue diplomatic engagements with Tehran "when it advances American interests".
summary: The United States has criticized Iran's recent presidential election, describing it as "neither free nor fair" and asserting that electing Masoud Pezeshkian as President will not alter the "Islamic Republic's stance on human rights". Pezeshkian, a reformist candidate, won the runoff election with approximately 53.6% of the vote, defeating ultraconservative Saeed Jalili. A US spokesperson emphasized that despite the election results, the United States intends to continue diplomatic engagements with Tehran "when it advances American interests".

title: Russian strikes disrupt life in northern Ukraine as it suffers power & water crisis
content: Russian strikes have resulted in widespread power outages and disruptions to water supply in northern Ukraine, with an increase in civilian casualties in the eastern region, Ukrainian authorities reported on Saturday. In the Sumy region, close to the Russian border, strikes late Friday damaged energy infrastructure, leaving more than 100,000 households without electricity, according to the Ukrainian Energy Ministry. Russian drones later targeted the city of Sumy, hitting power lines connected to the water pumping system, leading to a cut-off in water supply.
summary: Russian strikes have resulted in widespread power outages and disruptions to water supply in northern Ukraine, with an increase in civilian casualties in the eastern region, Ukrainian authorities reported on Saturday. In the Sumy region, close to the Russian border, strikes late Friday damaged energy infrastructure, leaving more than 100,000 households without electricity, according to the Ukrainian Energy Ministry. Russian drones later targeted the city of Sumy, hitting power lines connected to the water pumping system, leading to a cut-off in water supply.

title: Gold stolen in Canada's biggest ever heist ended up in India, Dubai: Police
content: Canada Police believes that the gold stolen last year in Canada's biggest-ever gold heist must have gone to India and Dubai gold markets. Over 6,500 gold bars disappeared overseas after being stolen from an airport, the department believes. "We believe a large portion has gone overseas to markets that are flush with gold," lead investigator Det. Sgt. Mike Mavity said.
summary: Canada Police believes that the gold stolen last year in Canada's biggest-ever gold heist must have gone to India and Dubai gold markets. Over 6,500 gold bars disappeared overseas after being stolen from an airport, the department believes. "We believe a large portion has gone overseas to markets that are flush with gold," lead investigator Det. Sgt. Mike Mavity said.

title: List of Hollywood moguls who want to replace Biden for America's leading role
content: Endeavor CEO Ari Emanuel blamed Biden's advisers for the CNN showdown. “He said he was going to run for one term, and he’s doing it to restore democracy. He then runs for a second term — that’s the first bit of malarkey, as he would say. He and his cohorts have told us that he’s [been] healthy for over a year,” Emanuel said.
summary: Endeavor CEO Ari Emanuel blamed Biden's advisers for the CNN showdown. “He said he was going to run for one term, and he’s doing it to restore democracy. He then runs for a second term — that’s the first bit of malarkey, as he would say. He and his cohorts have told us that he’s [been] healthy for over a year,” Emanuel said.

title: Rambling, gambling Biden insists he is fit to run in painful interview
Biden says he will opt out of presidential race only if Lord Almighty...
content: ​"Well, Yeah, I’m sure. Look. I mean, if the Lord Almighty came down and said, "Joe, get outta the race," I'd get outta the race. The Lord Almighty's not comin' down. I mean, these hypotheticals, George, if, I mean, it's all--" Biden said in the ABC News interview on a question on whether he would ever consider opting out.
summary: ​"Well, Yeah, I’m sure. Look. I mean, if the Lord Almighty came down and said, "Joe, get outta the race," I'd get outta the race. The Lord Almighty's not comin' down. I mean, these hypotheticals, George, if, I mean, it's all--" Biden said in the ABC News interview on a question on whether he would ever consider opting out.

title: Parkinson's disease expert met Biden's physician in January: Report
content: ​President Joe Biden's official health report certified him as fit and fine at 81 but now reports based on the visitors' record of the White House claimed that a top neurologist, Dr Kevin Cannard, a Parkinson's disease expert, met Biden's personal doctor Kevin O'Connor and two others at the White House on January 17. It is not known what they spoke about but according to insiders Biden's health was probably the topic they spoke.
summary: ​President Joe Biden's official health report certified him as fit and fine at 81 but now reports based on the visitors' record of the White House claimed that a top neurologist, Dr Kevin Cannard, a Parkinson's disease expert, met Biden's personal doctor Kevin O'Connor and two others at the White House on January 17. It is not known what they spoke about but according to insiders Biden's health was probably the topic they spoke.

title: Elon Musk's mother follows this flexitarian diet to remain fit at 76
content: Elon Musk's mother Maye Musk has a modeling career of over 50 years and now at the age of 76, she can give many a run for their money, all thanks to her flexitarian diet which is no vegetarianism and more flexible than that. Maye recently posed for the 2024 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue on the magazine's 60th anniversary and divulged her diet secrets. Her meal are mainly home-cooked and plant-based but sometimes she indulges in meat, fish etc. and her sugar intake is less -- but not nil. Everything in moderation is her key to diet.
summary: Elon Musk's mother Maye Musk has a modeling career of over 50 years and now at the age of 76, she can give many a run for their money, all thanks to her flexitarian diet which is no vegetarianism and more flexible than that. Maye recently posed for the 2024 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue on the magazine's 60th anniversary and divulged her diet secrets. Her meal are mainly home-cooked and plant-based but sometimes she indulges in meat, fish etc. and her sugar intake is less -- but not nil. Everything in moderation is her key to diet.

title: Jill Biden is angry, lashing out at Democrats who want President out of race
content: First Lady Jill Biden has made it clear that her husband President Joe Biden will not withdraw from the presidential race, albeit the pressure. Now reports claimed that Jill Biden is lashing out at those who want Biden out of the race. ABC News correspondent Marth Raddatz made this claim after Biden's interview with the channel Friday.
summary: First Lady Jill Biden has made it clear that her husband President Joe Biden will not withdraw from the presidential race, albeit the pressure. Now reports claimed that Jill Biden is lashing out at those who want Biden out of the race. ABC News correspondent Marth Raddatz made this claim after Biden's interview with the channel Friday.

UN side event spotlights China's rising Islamophobia targeting Uyghurs, Kazakhs
content: Human rights activists, diplomats, and other intellectuals highlighted the growing Islamophobia in China targeting Uyghur Muslims and Kazakhs during a side event at the UN Human Rights Council's 56th session in Geneva.
summary: Human rights activists, diplomats, and other intellectuals highlighted the growing Islamophobia in China targeting Uyghur Muslims and Kazakhs during a side event at the UN Human Rights Council's 56th session in Geneva.

title: Who is Victoria Starmer? Low-profile wife of UK PM
content: While much attention has been focused on Keir's historic victory, less is known about his wife, Victoria, who maintained a relatively low profile during the election campaign. The couple, both lawyers by training, married in 2007, a year before Starmer became Director of Public Prosecutions.
summary: While much attention has been focused on Keir's historic victory, less is known about his wife, Victoria, who maintained a relatively low profile during the election campaign. The couple, both lawyers by training, married in 2007, a year before Starmer became Director of Public Prosecutions.

title: Rift in Harry and Megan's relationship? Royal family author spills the beans about couple
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are reportedly facing a rift as Meghan expresses concerns about their future. Their Netflix contract is up for renewal, and her brand, American Riviera Orchard, has faced criticism. Markle feels under pressure and believes her work is unfairly criticized, causing tension in their new life in America.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are reportedly facing a rift as Meghan expresses concerns about their future. Their Netflix contract is up for renewal, and her brand, American Riviera Orchard, has faced criticism. Markle feels under pressure and believes her work is unfairly criticized, causing tension in their new life in America.
